text: Murad Iraklievich Margoshvili, also known by his nom de guerre Muslim Abu Walid al Shishani (taken from the Saudi fighter Abu al-Walid), is the commander of Junud al-Sham in Syria. Al Shishani was sanctioned by the US State Department on 24 September 2014 for reportedly building a base for foreign fighters. While Margoshvili is a Georgian national, he is also a Kist, a Chechen subethnos living mostly in the Pankisi Gorge. ==References== Category:Chechen Islamists Category:People of the Chechen wars Category:People of the Syrian Civil War Category:1972 births Category:Muslims from Georgia (country) Category:Islamists from Georgia (country) Category:Living people
title: Muslim Abu Walid al Shishani
